title: VCL-1137 - updating code to work with Perl 5.26
body: [VCL-1137](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/VCL-1137) - Added in code to allow for management node code to work with the perl-5.26.

title: Merging in Code Changes to manage session data in perl-5.26
body: Merging in Code Changes to manage session data in perl-5.26 via apache session management.

title: Develop
body: changes to spacing and capitalization in vcl.sql and some field size changes

title: Vcl-1091 log4perl functionality
body: Created logic to allow users to enable and use log4perl as a secondary logger.  This allows for users to customize the output of the logging.

title: Vcl-1082
body: Added in logic to get epoc timestamp from the database instead of generating it from the local machine.  This prevents issues when daylights saving time happens and clock goes back a hour.

title: Vcl 1087 vcl cas sso
body: When using CAS affiliation if we searched for an account using user lookup it would generate an error. Creating empty functions for affilValFunc, addUserFunc and updateUserFunc for CAS based affiliations will resolve this issue.

title: Fixed Spelling.
body:
Hi there, 
I wrote this bot based on the top 10 most misspelled english words.
(https://blog.oxforddictionaries.com/2016/08/02/corpus-misspellings/)
The bot queries, forks, clones, fixes and commits but I manually create the PRs.
All the best,
Jimmy

title: added a test line to the bottom of the file
VCL-1101 Changing chmod 755 from string to octal value
body: VCL-1101 Merge fix to make chmod be a octal value.

title: VCL-1097 Adding .gitignore files and empty tool directories
body: Adding the .gitignore files and empty tool directories to the project along with adding logic to the system to ignore the .gitignore files when scripts are being processed.
